text: Enrico Benedetti (born 16 August 1940) is a retired Italian ice hockey player who competed at the 1964 Winter Olympics. Between 1958 and 1974 he won multiple national titles with SG Cortina. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Italian ice hockey forwards Category:Ice hockey players at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Italy Category:SG Cortina players
title: Enrico Benedetti
